decks.notes: The deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Reanimate, then bringing them back onto the battlefield to overwhelm the opponent. It also includes disruptive elements like Thoughtseize and Force of Will to protect the combo. The key strategy is to efficiently reanimate creatures such as Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier to control the game and win through powerful attacks. The deck also utilizes cards like Brazen Borrower and Murktide Regent for additional threats and disruption, creating a versatile and aggressive gameplay style.

The deck focuses on controlling the game through a combination of removal spells and counterspells, while also utilizing card advantage and graveyard recursion. It aims to outvalue and outmaneuver opponents through efficient card draw and disruptive spells, while also having versatile threats that can close out the game quickly. The mana base is designed to provide access to a variety of colors to cast spells of different types, including powerful multicolored cards. The deck's strategy revolves around resource management, tempo plays, and exploiting the opponent's weaknesses to secure victory.

This deck focuses on controlling the opponent's plays and disrupting their strategy with cards like Thoughtseize, Force of Will, and Torpor Orb. The key concept revolves around using cards like Dress Down and Stock Up to manipulate the board state and maintain card advantage, while also utilizing powerful creatures like Nulldrifter and Phyrexian Dreadnought to apply pressure and close out the game quickly. The deck aims to stifle the opponent's options and control the game until it can secure a decisive victory.

This deck focuses on using low-cost creatures and spells to quickly and efficiently attack the opponent. The key strategy is to utilize the Ninjutsu ability of creatures like Yuriko, the Tiger's Shadow and Ingenious Infiltrator to surprise the opponent and deal significant damage. The deck also includes disruption cards like Force of Will and Daze to counter any threats from the opponent. The mana base includes a mix of fetch lands and dual lands to ensure consistency in casting spells, while cards like Brainstorm and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student help with card selection and card advantage.

The main concept of this deck is to disrupt the opponent's game plan while applying pressure and controlling the board through efficient removal and counterspells. Utilizing cards like Tamiyo, Brazen Borrower, and Thoughtseize to disrupt the opponent's strategy, while also deploying threats like Barrowgoyf and Nethergoyf to close out the game quickly. The deck aims to maintain tempo by utilizing cards like Brainstorm, Ponder, and Daze to ensure that the opponent is constantly on the back foot, while also utilizing efficient removal spells like Fatal Push to keep the board clear.

The main concept of this deck is to use a combination of lands like Boseiju, Who Endures and Crystal Vein along with powerful spells like Call Forth the Tempest and Creative Technique to ramp up quickly and cast game-ending threats like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Apex Devastator. The deck also utilizes cards like Throes of Chaos and Tibalt's Trickery to manipulate the top of the library and cheat out big creatures. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with its explosive plays and win the game through sheer power and speed.
